channel.title: Kicksecure 17.0.4.5 - for VirtualBox - Point Release!
channel.description:
Download Kicksecure for VirtualBox:
https://www.kicksecure.com/wiki/VirtualBox
----
# Upgrade
Alternatively, in-place release upgrade is possible upgrade using [Kicksecure repository](https://www.kicksecure.com/wiki/Project-APT-Repository).
----
This release would not have been possible without the numerous supporters of Kicksecure!
----
Please Donate!
https://www.kicksecure.com/wiki/Donate
----
Please Contribute!
https://www.kicksecure.com/wiki/Contribute
----
# Major Changes
* [tirdad](https://github.com/Kicksecure/tirdad) * install `tirdad` by default on Kicksecure Hosts * Add support for IPv6 (Thanks to Sirus Shahini!) * Live Check Systray: Fixed detect if all disks have been set to read-only. (https://forums.kicksecure.com/t/livecheck-sh-script-broken-on-bookworm/269/13) * systemcheck: run `apparmor-info` with `--boot` to avoid showing already fixed apparmor issues from previous boots
# Changelog
https://www.kicksecure.com/wiki/Changelog
----
# Full difference of all changes
[https://github.com/Kicksecure/derivative-maker/compare/17.0.3.0-developers-only...17.0.4.5-developers-only](https://github.com/Kicksecure/derivative-maker/compare/17.0.3.0-developers-only...17.0.4.5-developers-only)

item.title: Kicksecure 17.0.4.5 - for VirtualBox - Point Release!
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Download Kicksecure for VirtualBox:

Kicksecure – 20 Jul 23

Kicksecure ™ for Windows, macOS, Linux inside VirtualBox

Getting started with Kicksecure ™ in 4 simple steps.

Upgrade

Alternatively, in-place release upgrade is possible upgrade using Kicksecure repository.

This release would not have been possible without the numerous supporters of Kicksecure!

Please Donate!

Kicksecure – 25 Mar 23

Donating to Kicksecure ™

PayPal, Bitcoin (BTC), Monero (XMR), Ethereum (ETH) or Token, Credit Card, Bank Wire, Others

Please Contribute!

Kicksecure – 31 Jul 23

Contribute to Kicksecure

Spread, Follow, Develop, Testing, Donate. Contribute to Freedom Software / Open Source.

Major Changes

  • tirdad
    • install tirdad by default on Kicksecure Hosts
    • Add support for IPv6 (Thanks to Sirus Shahini!)
  • Live Check Systray: Fixed detect if all disks have been set to read-only. (Livecheck.sh script broken on bookworm - #13 by Patrick)
  • systemcheck: run apparmor-info with --boot to avoid showing already fixed apparmor issues from previous boots

Changelog

Kicksecure – 11 Aug 23

Changelog

Kicksecure ™ Release Notes, Changelog

Full difference of all changes

https://github.com/Kicksecure/derivative-maker/compare/17.0.3.0-developers-only…17.0.4.5-developers-only

Read full topic
